entry.title: Development Roadmap of Bitcoin Core 0.9.2
entry.summary: In an email exchange between Kristov Atlas and Wladimir, it was revealed that the release date for Tails 1.1, based on Wheezy, would be June 10th. This information was shared by Atlas in response to a query from Wladimir. The release date was confirmed by a link to the Tails website, which features a calendar of upcoming milestones. Tails is a live operating system designed to preserve privacy and anonymity while using the internet. It is based on Debian GNU/Linux and can be run from a USB drive, DVD, or SD card. The upcoming release, Tails 1.1, promises to include a number of improvements and bug fixes. Users can look forward to enhanced security features and better performance.
